ROOT:
-- DaoTerritories_D5_SelCnt -- 2014/2/9 日立 太郎 SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [Territories]
WHERE AND [TerritoryID] = @TerritoryIDAND [TerritoryID] IS NULL AND [TerritoryID] LIKE @TerritoryID_Like AND [TerritoryDescription] = @TerritoryDescriptionAND [TerritoryDescription] IS NULL AND [TerritoryDescription] LIKE @TerritoryDescription_Like AND [RegionID] = @RegionIDAND [RegionID] IS NULL AND [RegionID] LIKE @RegionID_Like
